channel.title: Networking on Harwell Software Community
channel.description: Recent content in Networking on Harwell Software Community

item.title: Satellite Applications Catapult special
item.description: When: 14th May 2018 Where: Videowall Room, Satellite Applications Catapult Outline: Trev Newell - Project Hepheastus (using satellite imagery to monitor the environmental impact of open cast mining in Chile) Keegan Neave - Project Eyes on the Seas (monitoring fishing around the world using satellite derived Automatic Identification System and supporting datasets) VR demo

item.title: Lightning talks
item.description: When: 26th March 2018 Where: R18 Visitors Centre, RAL Outline: Introduction Martyn Gigg - Jenkins Austen Rose - EPICS

item.title: Kickoff Meeting
item.description: When: 12th February 2018 13:00-14:00 Where: CR16&17, R80, RAL Outline: Hannah Griffin - Facilities Business Applications Owen Arnold - Building software for future science Philip Kershaw - Software at CEDA
